name: The Rosebud Condominium
description: Help Sarah, an aspiring architect, build a sprawling tower in this quick-paced hidden object game spanning the universe!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP, Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: 2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 900 MB available space Sound Card: Any Windows Compatible soundcard
